new_game_soon_text: This game will be available soon!
anas_number_garden_description: Help Ana round the number flowers in her garden!
read_build_mode_instructions: Build the number you hear on the abacus. (Level {{level}})
feedback_incorrect: Hmm, that's not right. Try again!
compare_instructions_level1_part1: Place the beads on the abacuses to represent the numbers:
compare_instructions_level1_part2_left: Left abacus for the first number
compare_instructions_level1_part2_right: Right abacus for the second number
compare_instructions_level1_part3: Then, compare the values in the {{placeValues}} to determine which number is larger.
compare_instructions_higher_level_part1: Build the numbers on the abacuses, then compare them starting with the highest place value ({{placeValue}}):
compare_instructions_higher_level_part2_: If the values are equal, move to the next position
If the values are different, the number with the larger value is greater
compare_instructions_higher_level_part3: Select the correct comparison symbol (less than, greater than, or equal to).
compare_guide_step1: Build the numbers on the two abacuses
compare_guide_step2: Start with the highest place value position ({{placeValue}})
compare_guide_step3: Compare the beads at the same position on both abacuses
compare_guide_step4: If the values are equal, move to the next position ({{placeValue}})
compare_guide_step5: Continue until you find a difference or check all positions
compare_guide_step6_less: < (less than): When the first number is smaller
compare_guide_step6_greater: > (greater than): When the first number is larger
compare_guide_step6_equal: = (equal to): When the numbers are identical
compare_feedback_explanation_equal: All values are the same, so {{num1}} equals {{num2}}.
compare_feedback_correct_message: Great job! You compared the numbers correctly.
compare_feedback_incorrect_message: Not quite. Check the place values carefully.
compare_controls_values_equal: Values are equal! We need to check the next position.
compare_controls_difference_found: Found a difference! We can stop comparing.
compare_display_ana_speech: Place the beads on the abacuses and then compare the numbers!
compare_hint_message: Hint for {{column}}: The number {{number}} should have {{count}} beads.
match_number_mode_instructions: Match the number {{number}} on the abacus. (Level {{level}})
write_number_mode_description: Which number is represented on the abacus?
tutorial_what_is_abacus_p1: The abacus is a calculation tool made of columns of beads. In our game, we have four columns:
tutorial_mode1_p1: A number will be displayed on the screen (e.g., "2456"). You need to place:
tutorial_mode2_p1: The number will be written in words (e.g., "two thousand four hundred fifty-six").
tutorial_mode2_p2: You need to interpret the number and place the corresponding beads on the abacus.
tutorial_mode3_p1: The abacus will already be filled with beads (e.g., 3 beads in Th, 7 in H, 0 in T, 8 in U).
tutorial_mode3_p2: You need to write the number in digits (in this case, 3708).
tutorial_placing_beads_li1: Click or tap a column to add a bead
tutorial_placing_beads_li2: Right-click or long-press to remove a bead
tutorial_placing_beads_li3: On mobile, you can also use the + and - buttons next to each column
tutorial_scoring_li1: You get points for each correct answer
tutorial_scoring_li2: After several correct answers, you earn stars
tutorial_scoring_li3: The treasure chest opens after every 5 levels
treasure_level_complete: You finished level {{level}} and unlocked a reward!
reward_desc_space: An abacus with beads shaped like stars and planets!
reward_desc_flowers: An abacus with beads shaped like colorful flowers!
reward_desc_treasure: You found a treasure! Keep learning for more rewards.
tutorial_mode4_p1: Help Ana round numbers! The game has 5 levels:
tutorial_mode4_l1: Level 1: Match digits to their place values (Units, Tens, Hundreds, Thousands) using drag-and-drop.
tutorial_mode4_l2: Level 2: Round numbers to the nearest Ten. Look at the Units digit!
tutorial_mode4_l3: Level 3: Round numbers to the nearest Hundred. Look at the Tens digit!
tutorial_mode4_l4: Level 4: Round numbers to the nearest Thousand. Look at the Hundreds digit!
tutorial_mode4_l5: Level 5: Mixed rounding - round to Tens, Hundreds, or Thousands as requested.
tutorial_mode4_p2: Choose the correct rounded number from the options provided (Levels 2-5).
rounding_place_value_instruction: Drag each digit to its correct place value:
rounding_feedback_incorrect_hint_tens: Remember to check the Units digit.
rounding_feedback_incorrect_hint_hundred: Remember to check the Tens digit.
rounding_feedback_incorrect_hint_thousan: Remember to check the Hundreds digit.
rounding_game_complete: Wow! You've completed all the levels! Amazing job!
rounding_level_1_instruction: Match the digits of {{number}} to their place values!
roman_treasure_description: Help Ana and Robi solve Roman numeral puzzles to unlock ancient treasures!
cosmic_calculator_description: Help Robi power his spaceship with calculations!
magic_bakery_description: Help Robi and Ana bake treats by adding ingredients with carrying over!
roman_treasure.error_loading: Error loading the game. Please try again.
roman_treasure.ana_level1: This chest has a {{symbol}}. What number is that?
roman_treasure.ana_write: How do we write the number {{number}} in Roman numerals?
roman_treasure.ana_read: What number does the Roman numeral {{roman}} represent?
roman_treasure.robi_greeting: Beep-boop! I am Robi. Ready for the challenge?

cosmic_calculator.ana_greeting: Hey there! Ready for a space adventure?
cosmic_calculator.ana_incorrect: Not quite, space cadet! Try again!
cosmic_calculator.general_error: A cosmic anomaly occurred! Please try again.
